content.string:
A hotfix to address issues in ranked play has been released.
[list] [*]Fixed grub stomping counting as alien kills in places it was not intended to, such as the achievements Smoking Barrels and Damage Amped. [*]Fixed marines getting stuck in fire extinguisher particles, staircases, and terrain. [/list]
Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop Update - January 19, 2023
